ComicInfo.Series: Crossed: Wish You Were Here Interlude
ComicInfo.Summary:
As the sortie group makes it's way back to Cava island, Shaky muses over the difficulties and differences between killing different things.
He also thinks about Sister Teresa who he encountered during the early days of the Crossed outbreak when he travelled with the Gamekeeper.

ComicInfo.Title: Interlude 12
